attributes.action: Save the Peat Moors Visitor Centre in Somerset from closure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to try and save the Peat Moors Visitor Centre.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save the Peat Moors Visitor Centre in Somerset from closure."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20384


Prime Minister's Office
